effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
